name: Chesstopia II
description:
Chesstopia is a place where Chess is thought about, but not played. Caissa, the Goddess of Chess, sends you on a proper quest - will you be up to the task? Simple Gamebook/CYOA. Mature themes.

This is the second episode of the Chesstopia series. It is recommended that you play the first episode before you play this one (Chesstopia).
